conversation.content: My leg is broken. I fallen from the floor. What should I do?
Call the on-site medical staff immediately. They are located near the lobby, next to the elevator. If you can't move, ask someone to call for you.
Okay, sure. I will do that. Thank you.
Stay calm and still, help will arrive soon. Did you understand? Say yes or no.
Remember to inform the medical staff about your injury, they will guide you further. You can reach them at extension 1234. Did you understand? Say yes or no.
